history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?For example, you can say I'm going to the airport
USER I'm going to the airport.
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER I want to leave from one on Center Apartments.
TTS Okay, leaving from one pa. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER No, I'm leaving from Craig and Centre.
TTS Okay, leaving from craig center. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER No, I'm leaving from Craig Street and Center Avenue.
TTS Okay, leaving from centre avenue and north craig st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER 4 P.M.
TTS Okay, travelling at 04:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 15 minutes, and you will take 2 busses. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER alternate route

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> This is route 2 of 4, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 20 minutes, and you will take 2 busses. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER alternate routes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> This is route 3 of 4, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 18 minutes, and you will take 2 busses. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yeah.

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 2 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Neville Ramp at Centre avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yeah.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> P3 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue at Thackeray avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 4:18pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
